name: Superior Close Tab: Close moves to left tab, and won't close Pinned Tabs
description:
1. After closing tab, new active tab is the left tab.
  
  2. Prevent pinned tabs from being closed with ctrl+w.
  
  You have to remap ctrl+w (or the shortcut of your choice) to the command before you can use this extension. Go to the bottom of the chrome://extensions page and click "Keyboard shortcuts", then remap the shortcut named "close tabs left, protect pinned tabs".

close tab.description: close tabs left, protect pinned tabs
